basics.name: Marco Concetto Rudilosso
basics.label: Software Maker
basics.summary: Marco is from Sicily, where he got too used to good summers. He is a student at UCL, studying Computer Science. In his second year he was in the top 5% of his class. He is interested in programming languages implementations and logic. Outside University, he likes food, going out with friends, playing football (actual football, not the american one) and videogames.

work.summary: Worked as a front-end developer in the partner integration team.
highlights: Helped moving from Angular to React
Acted as the main front-end developer of my team
Reviewed code from other front-end developers
Introduced other engineers to front-end developing

work.summary: Created a system that facilitates student - teaching assistants relationship.
highlights: Developed, deployed and maintained a system used by students during the academic year
Worked with Go, React, MySQL and Docker
Gathered requirements from the lecturer and turned them into something real
Iterated on the product on a weekly basis, by adding features or by fixing problems

volunteer.summary: TechSoc mission is to promote technological awareness and innovation both within and beyond UCL.
highlights: Been the director who has organised most events
Helped organising Porticode, a 24 hours hackathon that was help in December 2016
